SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INQUIRY WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}

SELECT INQ.INQUIRY_NO, INQ.USER_NO, INQ.CATEGORY_ID, BC.CATEGORY_NAME, -- JOIN으로 CATEGORY_NAME 가져오기 INQ.SUBCATEGORY_ID, INQ.INQUIRY_TITLE, INQ.INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQ.ADMIN_REPLY, INQ.STATUS, TO_CHAR(INQ.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS ENROLL_DATE, TO_CHAR(INQ.UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS UPDATE_DATE, INQ.INQUIRY_VIEWS FROM INQUIRY INQ LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY BC ON INQ.CATEGORY_ID = BC.CATEGORY_ID WHERE INQ.INQUIRY_NO = #{ino}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT INQUIRY_NO, INQUIRY_TITLE, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE FROM INQUIRY WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
